channel.title: Virus on status page
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=4.proxy8080.com
There's a few of them on the status page, I haven't had time to investigate properly but from the looks of it, it's pretty clear that this server can affect your computer.
Takoshscape is the name.

item.title: Virus on status page
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Thanks for telling us, I have removed all of the advertisements that I saw. If I missed any, feel free to link them.

Read full topic
